## Mock.returns() method

Sets the return value of calls to the Mock. Overrides any previous configuration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
returns(value: RETURN): Mock<ARGS, RETURN>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | RETURN | value to be returned. |
